name: FindingsRelatedToMedicationManagementTobaccoExposure
title: Findings Related to Medication Management, Tobacco Exposure
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes that document findings related to tobacco exposure.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Individual Characteristic

The intent of this data element is to document findings related to tobacco exposure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Any code that documents findings related to tobacco exposure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any code is not related to findings related to tobacco exposure.)

Exposed to tobacco smoke at home (finding)
